      • isWriteHeader

        public java.lang.Boolean isWriteHeader()
        Description copied from interface: XlsMetadataReportConfiguration
        Returns a boolean that specifies whether the export header (the column names) should be written or not.
        Specified by:
        isWriteHeader in interface XlsMetadataReportConfiguration
        See Also:

      • setWriteHeader

        public void setWriteHeader(java.lang.Boolean isWriteHeader)

      • getColumnNames

        public java.lang.String[] getColumnNames()
        Description copied from interface: XlsMetadataReportConfiguration
        Returns an array of strings representing the comma-separated names of the columns that should be exported. NOTE: The order of the columns is important and for accurate results they should be in the same order as the original columns.
        Specified by:
        getColumnNames in interface XlsMetadataReportConfiguration
        See Also:
        XlsMetadataReportConfiguration.PROPERTY_COLUMN_NAMES_PREFIX

      • setColumnNames
